title: Lead to the Table
objective: Accompany guests to their table correctly, creating a positive initial experience that sets the tone for their visit.

options.text: Table for two? Right this way.

scenes.hint: First impressions matter. Assess the situation before choosing your approach.

scenes.text: They respond: 'Yes, thank you.' They follow you with positive energy. Several tables are available.

options.text: Near the restroom (most convenient for staff).
Outdoor terrace with candle lighting (romantic view).

scenes.hint: Consider the guests' apparent preferences when selecting a table.

scenes.text: One guest smiles and asks: 'Could you bring us the menu?'

options.text: Of course, I'll be right back.

scenes.hint: This is an opportunity to upsell and enhance their experience.
